item.title: Interface Questions!
item.dc:creator: @EpicScape EpicScape
item.description:
@EpicScape wrote:

ok i have this code and i want the interface to show up right when the person logs in i have the code i just dont know where to put it?!?

sendQuest("@blu@RULES!@blu@", 3026); //Title clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("@red@Teh Rules Of EpicScape@red@", 3027); sendQuest("@blu@~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~@blu@", 3028); sendQuest("@whi@Must Have 4+ Items When Pking@whi@", 3029); sendQuest("@whi@No Autoing!@whi@", 3030); sendQuest("@whi@No Hacking!@whi@", 3031); sendQuest("@whi@No Multi-Logging!", 3032); sendQuest("@whi@No Disrespecting Admins!@whi@", 3033); sendQuest("@whi@No Disrespecting Mods!@whi@", 3034); sendQuest("@whi@No Impersonating!@whi@", 3035); sendQuest("@blu@~~~~~~~~~~~Enjoy~~~~~~~~~@blu@", 3036); showInterface(3023);

and also can someone give me a link to some different looking interfaces the one in that code is the stone one… thanks
